tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Sonal and her assistants are very helpful and co-operative. Her dental clinic is spacious, clean and updated. 
She always suggest good options for her patients. ***** ******* *** *********** ********* *** **********
Overall experience is great, highly recommended
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Sonal was very kind of accommodate me for a tooth extraction, in spite of having a family vacation plan. 

The tooth extraction was painless. Within a minute the tooth was out and I did not even realize.

Dr. Sonal followed up with me while on her holiday making sure there was no pain or bleeding. 

Its rare to find such a dedicated Dr in today's time. Everyone is just so focused on their fees and nothing more.

Thanks
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

review: The treatment of my process was explained to me clearly , so I knew what was happening , and it was a satisfying experience
reply_text: Thank you very much dear Nicola. It was a pleasure to be of service to you and your wonderful son.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Sonal for tongue burning symptoms at the tip and was extremely worried. She examined and mentioned that it is due to Vitamin B12 deficiency and prescribed the course of treatment along with Anabel Gel. Her explanation of the problem and how it can be treated is comforting for the patient and I felt at ease. Highly recommend her as she has vast and extensive experience in her field. All the best!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

review:
***** ********* ***** *I went thru a RTC and went through 3 seatings. The pain aggrevated after the 3 seatings and was so painful that I could not sleep for days.
When I went back to her she took an x-ray *** *** ** ******** *later she sent it to some other endodentist to take his consultation and she came back saying that they missed the 3rd root which she thought was not present and now I have to shell out extra for this expert who will come and redo the entire procedure of RTC. Already she made me go thru 3 seatings and now redoing the entire procedure with extra fees involved.*** ***** *** *** *** *** *** **** * These doctors do this from morning till night *** ***** ***** ****** ***** ***** *** *** **** ****** ** ** ****** ** * 
Very very disappointing and I surely would never recommend anyone to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As always, excellent care **** **************  capable and friendly doctor. A pleasure to go to Dr Sonal for the treatment as you know she will show you the right treatment and will always keep the patient first. She will ensure you are not charged unnecessary, you don't hv to make additional visits and the right treatment is given to you without any delay or extra sittings.
reply_text: Thank you for kind words .really appreciate it .
